title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 229.61 - Reports
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 229.61 - Reports

State Regulations

Each company shall file a report for each calendar month
with the office of this commission in the City of New York or in the City of

Albany not more than 20 days after the expiration of the calendar month
including the results of all tests and computations required herein, full
relevant information for each testing station required herein, an explanation
for each instance of noncompliance with the rules and regulations herein that
may have occurred and a statement regarding each relevant emergency that may
have occurred. Said report shall be furnished on a form, corresponding to that
illustrated in form B and form C, Appendix 7-B of this Title, and provided by
the company, be signed by a responsible official of the
company. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
229.61

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
